entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who left the Burrow, indicating that he is a key character in the story. ("Let’s go downstairs, there’s a lot to tell you, and I want to know what’s happened after you left the Burrow.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the person who points her wand at the gate, indicating that she has magical abilities. ("They descended into the kitchen, where Hermione pointed her wand at the gate.")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as the person who pulls butterbeers from beneath his traveling cloak, indicating that he has a role in the story. ("Lupin pulled a few butterbeers from beneath his traveling cloak and they sat down.")
